tool_description: Exports temperature and compliance data in various formats for external analysis, backup, or regulatory submission.

export_type.description: Data type to export: temperature_logs, compliance_records, violation_history, calibration_data, alert_history

file_format.description: Export format: csv, json, xml, excel

include_headers.description: Whether to include column headers in export

error_messages: Invalid export_type: Must be one of [temperature_logs, compliance_records, violation_history, calibration_data, alert_history].
Invalid date range: date_range_start must be before date_range_end, both in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid file_format: Must be one of [csv, json, xml, excel].
Export size exceeded: Requested data export exceeds maximum file size limit.
No data available: No records found for specified export criteria.
usage: Specify export_type, date range, and file_format. Optionally configure include_headers for structured exports. Tool generates downloadable file with requested data.

export_id.description: Unique identifier for this export operation

records_exported.description: Number of records included in export file

file_size_bytes.description: Size of generated export file in bytes

download_url.description: URL where export file can be downloaded
